      • authValidator

        Boolean authValidator(String validatorType,
                      AuthenticationValidatorDTO authenticationValidatorDTO)
        Common Validator for all the Authentications
        Parameters:
        validatorType - The type of validator
        authenticationValidatorDTO - The authentication validation inputs
        Returns:
        Boolean returning whether it is matched or not

      • authValidator

        AuthTokenDTO authValidator(String validatorType,
                           String userId,
                           String otp)
        Validator for OTP authentication
        Parameters:
        validatorType - The type of validator which is OTP
        userId - The userId
        otp - otp entered
        Returns:
        AuthTokenDTO returning authtokendto
